allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(types\): implement TypeScript type system and project foundation

Implemented complete TypeScript type definitions for the Hyntx system:
- Schema and log types \(ClaudeMessage, ExtractedPrompt, LogReadResult, DayGroup\)
- Analysis types \(AnalysisPattern, AnalysisResult, BeforeAfter\)
- Provider types \(AnalysisProvider, ProviderLimits, ProviderType\)
- Configuration types \(EnvConfig, OllamaConfig, AnthropicConfig, GoogleConfig\)
- CLI types \(CliOptions, ExitCode, OutputFormat\)
- Shell configuration types \(ShellConfigResult, ShellType\)

Added project setup files following docs/DEVELOPMENT.md specifications:
- package.json with scripts and dependencies
- tsconfig.json with strict TypeScript configuration
- eslint.config.js with strict type checking rules
- prettier.config.js for code formatting
- tsup.config.ts for ESM build
- vitest.config.ts for testing framework
- .npmrc for package manager configuration

Created minimal entry point \(src/index.ts\) to export types and enable verification.

Updated ROADMAP.md to mark tipos-base.md task as completed.

All types use readonly modifiers for immutability, follow naming conventions,
and include JSDoc comments. The type system passes all checks \(typecheck, lint, format\).
